title: Complete Web Development Bootcamp
description: Master HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js and more. Build real-world projects and land your dream job.

title: Data Science & Machine Learning
description: Learn Python, pandas, scikit-learn, TensorFlow. Build ML models and analyze data like a pro.

title: Digital Marketing Mastery
description: SEO, Social Media, Google Ads, Content Marketing. Grow your business with proven strategies.

title: UI/UX Design Fundamentals
description: Learn design principles, Figma, prototyping, and user research. Create beautiful interfaces.

title: Python Programming Complete
description: From basics to advanced Python. Learn Django, Flask, automation, and data analysis.

title: Mobile App Development
description: Build iOS and Android apps with React Native. Publish your apps to app stores.

title: Cloud Computing & AWS
description: Master AWS, Azure, Docker, Kubernetes. Deploy scalable applications to the cloud.

title: Cybersecurity Essentials
description: Learn ethical hacking, network security, cryptography. Protect systems from threats.
